casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 30, 2010

[Cite as 03/30/2010 Case Announcements #2, 2010-Ohio-1331.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-0496. State ex rel. Cleveland v. Sutula.

Cuyahoga App. No. 94264, 2010-Ohio-914. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the common pleas court proceedings,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
